name: Heisei Pistol Show
storyline:
"One day... I was betrayed... so I will definitely... kill him!!!"

Heart, a skilled assassin who loves lolita fashion, betrays his organization to seek revenge on his former lover. Alongside his talking pistol (named Pistol), he goes on a quest to assassinate the organization's "Top Three."

1. Tyoveryba - An ostracized wolf with a love for girly things. (Hobby: table tennis.)
2. Tokimeki - A cutely-dressed, charming young girl with a heroic attitude. (Hobby: motorboat racing.)
3. Fever - A strange man with a fashion sense like the Mad Hatter combined with Frankenstein. (Hobby: surfing the net.)
